name: Puyo Puyo Style
description:
This LoRA is intended to replicate the style of the "Puyo Puyo" games.

Trained off of AOM3A1 for 5592/6384 steps for v1/v2 respectively. No trigger word needed for v1, trigger word is "puyopuyo" for v2.

modelVersions.name: v2.0
modelVersions.description: Trained on more images, intended to improve both posture and backgrounds.
